description: List the Amazon Web Services services for which the specified account is a delegated administrator. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID number of a delegated administrator account in the organization.

nested_items.name: DelegatedServices
nested_items.description: The services for which the account is a delegated administrator.

nested_items.name: ServicePrincipal
nested_items.description: The name of an Amazon Web Services service that can request an operation for the specified service. This is typically in the form of a URL, such as: servicename.amazonaws.com.

nested_items.name: DelegationEnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date that the account became a delegated administrator for this service.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null.
